channel.title: Stuff - Update: table v2
channel.description:
I will post most of the extreme noobish stuff i make in cinema 4d in this topic.
17.06 Table whit a dvd: [IMG]http://i208.photobucket.com/albums/bb142/lordbost/tablewhitabook0001-1.jpg[/img]

item.title: Stuff - Update: table v2
item.dc:creator: @lordbost lordbost
item.description:
@lordbost wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:12, topic:213182”][quote author=FastBawlz link=topic=280657.msg2284517#msg2284517 date=1213847255]

blah blah blah bla

I just finished the tutorial, ill pm you it, and all you have to do is download kitchen probe, make a huge sphere, and then make a new texture and change the color the kitchen probe. I explained it in the video.

Why not just share with the rest of the community and post it in the Graphics Tutorials section?
[/quote]
Its pretty crappy, but lordbost, can you give me that link again so i can post it?[/quote]
I sent you the link in a pm

Read full topic

item.title: Stuff - Update: table v2
item.dc:creator: @lordbost lordbost
item.description:
@lordbost wrote:

Frell:

I cant find the spoon tutorial but ill make one if i cant find that old one, and pm it to you.

That would be great.

Frell:

Don’t do tables. Wood is one of the hardest things to make look real. Try making a spoon with HDR lighting.

I went to the link you posted earlier [quote=“Frell, post:2, topic:213182”]http://www.maxoncomputer.com/tutorial_detail.asp?tutorialID=241[/quote]
But i didn’t manage to make it, because i don’t have any plugin named “convert HDR probe…” (actually, i don’t have any plugins at all)

Read full topic

item.title: Stuff - Update: table v2
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Don’t do tables. Wood is one of the hardest things to make look real. Try making a spoon with HDR lighting.

Heres my spoon, there easier to make then tables.

I cant find the spoon tutorial but ill make one if i cant find that old one, and pm it to you.

Read full topic

item.title: Stuff - Update: table v2
item.dc:creator: @lordbost lordbost
item.description:
@lordbost wrote:

goatee:

Post it all on one topic, kay?

I will post everything i make in this topic

[quote=“Frell, post:2, topic:213182”]Add a HDR, Just make a sphere thats bigger than the floor and table (like bigger than the whole scene), then apply a probe to it, here: http://www.maxoncomputer.com/tutorial_detail.asp?tutorialID=241

Wood more reflective (just a lil)

make legs skinnier.

and try using a tile floor, if you go to textures > load textures > MAXON > materials > basic >
and theres a huge list of basic materials.[/quote]
Thanks for all the tips

On another topic

Is the floor supposed to be that reflective? It looks like you put the table on a mirror.

I will try to see if i can make it less reflective

Read full topic

item.title: Stuff - Update: table v2
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Post it all on one topic, kay?

Read full topic

item.title: Stuff - Update: table v2
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Add a HDR, Just make a sphere thats bigger than the floor and table (like bigger than the whole scene), then apply a probe to it, here: http://www.maxoncomputer.com/tutorial_detail.asp?tutorialID=241

Wood more reflective (just a lil)

make legs skinnier.

and try using a tile floor, if you go to textures > load textures > MAXON > materials > basic >
and theres a huge list of basic materials.

Read full topic
